thread.title: Area golf
thread.title_full: Area golf for Oct. 14 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Area golf
text:
Area golf
CRAG BURN: President’s Cup Tournament — Tim McGrath def. Drew Kinder.
Area holes in one
Mike Borderick, 125-yard 13th hole at Diamond Hawk, with a pitching wedge.
George Clifford, 140-yard 6th hole at Bob-O-Links, with an 8-iron.
Gary Klenk, 148-yard 9th hole at Tan Tara, with an 8-iron.
Randy Kramer, 235-yard 4th hole at East Aurora, with a 3-hybrid.
Frank Muggia, 152-yard 6th hole at Orchard Park, with an 8-iron.
Sam Sebastian, 150-yard 8th hole at Sheridan, with an 8-iron.
Joe Vecchio, 126-yard 10th hole at Tan Tara, with a pitching wedge.
